name: WormHoles
description:
Hi i am Malik Utku Vur  and this is my first complate game, actually i started many projects before but never managed to finish any of them so i join this game jam.

WormHoles is a puzzle platformer which happens in a sci-fi/alien world, puzzles are easy although timing may be tricky. Also game is very short i managed to make few levels however i give my best to make them pretty.

I hope you like it, Have fun!
